<xsd:simpleType name="VersionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element contains information to which version of the web service the client refers. The following situations are indicated:
- Version equals a value lower than 2: This situation corresponds with the situation that no version element is sent. That is the situation before the current version of the web service (v10). - Version equals a value equal to 2: This situation corresponds with the situation that the version element is relevant. From version 2 and higher, the elements CardProvider, CardSubType and CardPersonalized are returned in CardInformationType - Version equals a value equal to 3: This situation corresponds with the situation that the version element is relevant. From version 3 and higher, the elements ServiceType, ServiceTime and Replacement are returned in CardInformationType - Version equals a value higher than 3: RFU.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> con:request.name: Maak kaart aan
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ovc="http://nsc.nl/xi/int/ovcpz">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ovc:MT_iga_req>\r <eidType>NS</eidType>\r <!--NS, NONNS-->\r <cardType>Pcard</cardType>\r <!--Pcard, Acard-->\r <ingangsdatum>${#TestCase#ingangsdatumKaart}</ingangsdatum>\r <einddatum>${#TestCase#einddatumKaart}</einddatum>\r <geboortedatum>${#TestCase#GeboorteDatum}</geboortedatum>\r <kaartstatus>Enabled</kaartstatus>\r <!--Uninitialized, Enabled, Blocked-->\r <servicetype></servicetype> <!--LostStolen, CardRenewal, CardReplacement, LSonRenewal, EndCard-->\r <replacement>false</replacement>\r <!--true, false-->\r <servicetime/>\r <createIbase>true</createIbase>\r <NALsimulation>true</NALsimulation>\r </ovc:MT_iga_req>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

<order xmlns="http://schemaserver/schemas/1.0/" xmlns:SOAP="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <order_nr>*</order_nr> <order_date>${#TestCase#bestelDatum}</order_date> <order_amount>${#TestCase#prijsSamenvatting_ZTOT}</order_amount> <order_status>In behandeling</order_status> <first_term_amount>${#TestCase#prijsSamenvatting_ZTOT}</first_term_amount> <payment_method>Jaarlijks</payment_method> <partner_function>B</partner_function> <is_cancellation_allowed>false</is_cancellation_allowed> <order_line> <line_number>10</line_number> <engraved_id>${Maak kaart aan#Response#//SOAP:Envelope//SOAP:Body//ns1:MT_iga_res//engravedID}</engraved_id> <view_traveldetails>Nee</view_traveldetails> <status>Klaar om op te halen</status> <product_description>${#TestCase#omschrijving_regel_10}</product_description> <product_code>${#TestCase#product_regel_10}</product_code> <class>${#TestCase#productKlasse_regel_10}</class> <start_date>${#TestCase#bestelDatum}</start_date> <duration>Doorlopend</duration> <line_gross_amount>${#TestCase#prijsSamenvatting_ZTOT}</line_gross_amount> <line_netto_amount>${#TestCase#prijsSamenvatting_ZTOT}</line_netto_amount> </order_line> </order>

con:config.script:
import groovy.xml.XmlUtil import groovy.xml.StreamingMarkupBuilder
def response = context.expand( '${OLMCARD#Response}' ) def xml = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response) def StatusFeedbackMessage = '' def actionIDCounter = 1000 Date currentdate = new Date() def prodseqnr
xml.Body.RetrieveOLMCardResponse.RetrieveOrder.each { prodseqnr = Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 600) + 1 StatusFeedbackMessage += '<ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage>' + '<ns0:SourceCode>Website</ns0:SourceCode>' + '<ns0:SourceChannel>NAL</ns0:SourceChannel>' + '<ns0:ChannelOrderID>' + it.OrderRetailerId.toString() + '</ns0:ChannelOrderID>' + '<ns0:OrderID>' + it.OrderId.toString() + '</ns0:OrderID>' + '<ns0:PaymentReference/>' + '<ns0:LineResult>' + '<ns0:LineNum>1</ns0:LineNum>' + '<ns0:ActionStatus>Delivered</ns0:ActionStatus>' + '<ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>' + currentdate.format('yyyy-MM-dd') + 'T11:25:12.710</ns0:ActionStatusDateTime>' + '<ns0:ActionID>' + actionIDCounter + '</ns0:ActionID>' + '<ns0:ActionType>FareProductSale</ns0:ActionType>' + '<ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>' + prodseqnr + '</ns0:ProductSequenceNumber>' + '</ns0:LineResult>' + '<ns0:ResultCode>' + '<ns0:Code>0</ns0:Code>' + '<ns0:Description>Successful</ns0:Description>' + '</ns0:ResultCode>' + '</ns0:StatusFeedbackMessage>' actionIDCounter++ }
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "StatusFeedbackMessage", StatusFeedbackMessage ) //log.info ( StatusFeedbackMessage )
